issue.title: MS Project XML import shows resources with 0% "Units" (despite full allocation to task)

comment.body:
Please follow the instructions in the manual to run the latest git version: [https://taskjuggler.org/tj3/manual/Installation.html#Installing_TaskJuggler_from_the_Git_Repository](https://taskjuggler.org/tj3/manual/Installation.html#Installing_TaskJuggler_from_the_Git_Repository)
I'll only make a release if the new export has been confirmed to work well.

issue.title: MS Project XML import shows resources with 0% "Units" (despite full allocation to task)

comment.body: I no longer have access to MS Project, so I'm just guessing how it might work. I've just committed a change. Please check if that works for you.

commits.message:
Fix: Attempt to fix MS Project XML export for newer MSP versions.

I have no idea if that works since I can't test it.
https://github.com/taskjuggler/TaskJuggler/issues/122
Fix: Eliminate use of useless variable
New: Adding support for messages 160 and 312
Fix: Last commit broke Ruby versions < 3.1. This fixes it.
Fix: Newer versions of YAML now require allow listed classes
